metadata.name: Dollhouse
metadata.description:
A study of play.  
2022.

Life can be broken down into a series of lessons.  
These aren't necessarily good or bad, but they are inevitable.  
We always have a choice though.  
Ignore the lessons and go around in circles  
or  
Deep dive and embrace them, master them.  
The latter usually results in a shift;  
Lessons turn into play  
and  
Life turns into your playground.


Seen here, is a girl submerged in a state of play, completely surrendering herself.  
The metallic sheen on her skin symbolises her resilience while her bunny ears show her sense of playfulness.  
She is surrounded by hard covers representing lessons learnt. 
Some were difficult, some are mastered and some even cherished.  
The flora and the flamingos bring about a sense of lushness, a life lived and truly experienced.  
Finally, the Easter eggs and my beloved moonmen, ever present, ever watchful.
